title: MC_CheckAccessALT For Marwell Zoo
text: The MC_CheckAccess stored procedure is used for MACScanner software to check and admit members, tickets and bookings. Marwell have a bespoke stored procedure, with some changes that they want. The stored procedure of this is attached to this Knowledge Base article.
